message.content:
1. Sedation Scores were compared.
2. Rescue analgesic consumption was compared.
3. Time to the first rescue analgesics administration was compared.
4. Hemodynamic values were compared.
5. SpO2 values were compared.
6. These comparisons were part of the secondary objective.

messages.content:
Statement: Comparison of Sedation Scores, rescue analgesic consumption, time to the first rescue analgesics administration, hemodynamic and SpO2 values were regarded as the secondary objective.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
